This action deletes all visible entries (%1$d). Are you sure that you want to proceed? This operation cannot be undone! Summary/Description The first line is interpreted as summary, the rest as description. Hashtags are interpreted as categories (eg #category). Use speech-to-text Speech-to-text engine is listening. Speech-to-text engine stopped listening. Sorry, Speech-to-text engine encountered an error. (%1$s) Entry without summary/description cannot be created.
Upload pending Recurring entry
Congratulations, this is your first journal entry :-) Journals can be used to keep your notes for a specific date. Use this functionality for example for protocols, meeting minutes, diary entries and so on. If you edit this entry, you will see the options to add categories, attendees, attachments, … Feel free to delete this entry whenever you want! Congratulations, this is your first note entry :-) Notes are traditional notes and not bound to a dedicated date. Like journals you can add attachments, attendees and more when editing or adding an entry. By the way you can also add subtasks to any entry, no matter if it\'s a journal, note or task! Congratulations, this is your first task entry :-) Additionally to journals and notes, tasks can have a planned start, a due and a completed date. They can be checked when they are done or a progress can be set. Edit this entry to check out all options :-) #FirstSteps
Go to original Instance of recurring "This entry is part of a series. Editing this entry will unlink it from the series, it will continue as a standalone event and changes on the original event will not affect this entry anymore. " App Permission jtx Board needs the permission in order to record audio or use speech-to-text functionalities. Please grant the permission to use this feature. #mycategory Add a category johanna@example.com Add an attendee (e-mail-address). Attention: Servers might automatically process attendees e.g. by sending iMIP messages. Please enter a valid email-address Projector Add a resource Jim Dolittle, +1 919 555 1234 Contact information of the responsible or owner of this entry Your comment… Add a comment Add attachment Take picture Add attachment link https://www.example.com URL related to this entry 1CP Conference Room 4350 Add a location for this entry Your attachment-url (https://…) Your comment * Please note that attachments are considered an experimental feature. Currently only small attachments (up to 100 KB) can be exported as .ics and synchronized via DAVx⁵. If you encounter any issues, please let us know through the support forums or a support request on the website!

A summary or description should be provided. The Due date cannot be before the Start date. Please choose a timezone for both, start and due, or deactivate timezones. A category was entered but not confirmed. Please confirm or delete. A comment was entered but not confirmed. Please confirm or delete. A resource was entered but not confirmed. Please confirm or delete. An attendee was entered but not confirmed. Please confirm or delete. A subtask was entered but not confirmed. Please confirm or delete. App permission jtx Board can suggest Attendee data based on your contacts as input values for your entries. Read Permissions on your contacts is needed to enable this feature. Unsupported recurrence rule detected! An unknown or unsupported recurrence rule was detected. If you save this entry, the existing recurrence rule will be deleted/overwritten. Unsupported value (Duration) detected! A duration was detected for this entry in the background. Handling a duration is currently not supported by jtx Board. Please use the start, due and end date instead. If you save this entry, the existing duration will be deleted.

Special thanks to FFG for their trust and financial support to realize this project. Thanks to for contributions in jtx Board is an open source app that appreciates the participation and contribution of the open source community. On this page we would like to attribute the efforts of community members for translations. If you would like to edit/add translations or add new languages to this app, feel free to join the jtx Board project on the translation platform POEditor: Join on POEditor.com
Local Collections Remote Collections Journals: %1$s Notes: %1$s Tasks: %1$s No local Collections found No remote Collections found Collections are an accumulation of entries like folders with files. You can create new local collections through the menu or you can set up new remote collections to synchronize through DAVx⁵. Collection menu Add local Collection Edit local Collection Delete \"%1$s\"? Deleting a collection will also delete all journals, notes and tasks within this collection. This cannot be undone. Are you sure that you want to continue? Exporting collection finished successfully. An error occurred while exporting the selected collection. Move all entries from \"%1$s\" to Please note: Only writeable collections and collections with support for the same components (Journals, Notes, Tasks) can be selected.

Sync with DAVx⁵ (coming soon) jtx Board does not provide server-synchronisation itself, but will support synchronisation through DAVx⁵. This method will allow you to use a compatible CalDAV-server of your choice to store, backup and syncrhonise your data. \nThis feature is still under development and will be released soon! Stay tuned on our website and on Twitter :-) Sync with DAVx⁵ (beta)* jtx Board does not provide server-synchronisation itself, but supports synchronisation through DAVx⁵. This method allows you to use any compatible CalDAV-server of your choice to store, backup and syncrhonise your data. * Please note that this functionality is still considered as beta. Although this functionality has been tested, issues might still occur. If you encounter any problem, we would appreciate your feedback! Congratulations! :-) We have detected DAVx⁵ on your phone. If you haven\'t set up any accounts yet, please follow the instructions on our website: We have detected DAVx⁵ on your phone. If you have any troubles or doubts, please check out our website first: The following accounts (calendars) are currently synchronised: Check out DAVx⁵! We have not detected DAVx⁵ on your phone.\nFor more information about the Sync please see: or get DAVx⁵ on For more information about DAVx⁵ please check out Add account in DAVx⁵ Failed opening DAVx⁵, please open the app manually. Triggering sync in DAVx⁵ failed, please check in DAVx⁵.
The development of an app is a complex topic and development, maintenance and support is hard work. So if you like this app and if you would like to ensure continuous development, please consider a donation :-) Thank you! Donate with If you would like to consier any other donation method, please check our website:
The development of an app is a complex topic and development, maintenance and support is hard work. Your version of jtx Board is free and financed by advertisements. By accepting ads you contribute to the ongoing development and financing of this project. This version of jtx Board is using non-personalized ads. If you prefer this app without ads, please consider the following upgrade: Upgrade to jtx Board Ad-free Thank you for considering the ad-free upgrade of jtx Board. This upgrade removes the recurring ads from this app. Thank you for buying jtx Board Ad-free Ads are now removed from the app. If you like this app and you would like to support the continuous development, please also consider the subscription. Subscription for jtx Board Ad-free The subscription removes the recurring ads from this app and additionally you support the continuous development of this app. Thank you for buying the jtx Board Ad-free! Ads are now removed from the app. Thank you for your contribution to keep this project alive! Thank you! Quarterly Reset user consent Manage subscription Purchased on %1$s Order ID: %1$s
